newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Asian Terminals firms up debt issue.
newsitem.headline: Asian Terminals firms up debt issue.

text.p: Asian Terminals Inc said on Thursday it had signed an underwriting agreement with a group of local investment houses for the offering of 1.5 billion pesos worth of long-term commercial papers.
The port operator said the proceeds of the issue would be used to modernise and expand its facilities, procure additional heavy equipment and refinance short-term loans.
ATI had chosen All AsiaCapital and Trust Corp as the issue manager and lead underwriter.
The issue has yet to be approved by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
An All AsiaCapital official said the commercial papers may carry various maturities of three to six years.
